full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG SHAMBHA LAR 'PHO BA SKAL LDAN MYUR 'DREN PHYOGS MTHUN SMON LAM DRI MED BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES BYANG SHAMBHA LAR 'PHO BA'I MAN NGAG SKAL LDAN MYUR 'DREN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SEMS DPA' SPRUL SKU DANG, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RNAMS LA DUS 'KHOR RNAM SPRUL DU LUNG BSTAN CING, RANG NYID LA'ANG DAD LDAN RNAMS SHAMBHA LAR 'KHRID NUS PA'I SNANG BA CUNG ZAD YOD PA, SHI RAS TH MKHAS BTZUN BLO @005B GROS BZANG PO'I 'PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
